24 struct EulerAngles
25 {
26  double roll, pitch, yaw;
27 };
28 
29 const double PI = 3.14159265359;
30 
35 EulerAngles ToEulerAngles(Quaternion q)
36 {
37  EulerAngles angles;
38 
39  // roll (x-axis rotation)
40  double sinr_cosp = 2 * (q.w * q.x + q.y * q.z);
41  double cosr_cosp = 1 - 2 * (q.x * q.x + q.y * q.y);
42  angles.roll = std::atan2(sinr_cosp, cosr_cosp);
43 
44  // pitch (y-axis rotation)
45  double sinp = 2 * (q.w * q.y - q.z * q.x);
46  if (std::abs(sinp) >= 1)
47  angles.pitch = std::copysign(M_PI / 2, sinp); // use 90 degrees if out of range
48  else
49  angles.pitch = std::asin(sinp);
50 
51  // yaw (z-axis rotation)
52  double siny_cosp = 2 * (q.w * q.z + q.x * q.y);
53  double cosy_cosp = 1 - 2 * (q.y * q.y + q.z * q.z);
54  angles.yaw = std::atan2(siny_cosp, cosy_cosp);
55 
56  return angles;
57 }
58 
63 Quaternion ToQuaternion(double yaw, double pitch, double roll) // yaw (Z), pitch (Y), roll (X)
64 {
65  double cy = cos(yaw * 0.5);
66  double sy = sin(yaw * 0.5);
67  double cp = cos(pitch * 0.5);
68  double sp = sin(pitch * 0.5);
69  double cr = cos(roll * 0.5);
70  double sr = sin(roll * 0.5);
71 
72  Quaternion q;
73  q.w = cr * cp * cy + sr * sp * sy;
74  q.x = sr * cp * cy - cr * sp * sy;
75  q.y = cr * sp * cy + sr * cp * sy;
76  q.z = cr * cp * sy - sr * sp * cy;
77 
78  return q;
79 }
80 
84 void angleTo360(double &angle)
85 {
86  if(angle < 0)
87  angle = -angle;
88  else
89  angle = 360 - angle;
90 }
91 
95 float mapValue(float x, float in_min, float in_max, float out_min, float out_max)
96 {
97  return (x - in_min) * (out_max - out_min) / (in_max - in_min) + out_min;
98 }
